verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

If a soul <WH5315> sin <WH2398>, and commit <WH4603> a trespass <WH4604> against the LORD <WH3068>, and lie <WH3584> unto his neighbour <WH5997> in that which was delivered <WH6487> him to keep, or in fellowship <WH8667> <WH3027>, or in a thing taken away by violence <WH1498>, or hath deceived <WH6231> his neighbour <WH5997>; in fellowship: or, in dealing fellowship: Heb. putting of the hand

Or have found <WH4672> that which was lost <WH9>, and lieth <WH3584> concerning it, and sweareth <WH7650> falsely <WH8267>; in any <WH259> of all these that a man <WH120> doeth <WH6213>, sinning <WH2398> therein <WH2007>:

Then it shall be, because he hath sinned <WH2398>, and is guilty <WH816>, that he shall restore <WH7725> that <WH1500> which he took violently away <WH1497>, or the thing <WH6233> which he hath deceitfully gotten <WH6231>, or that which was delivered <WH6487> <WH853> him to keep <WH6485>, or the lost thing <WH9> which he found <WH4672>,

Or all that about which he hath sworn <WH7650> falsely <WH8267>; he shall even restore <WH7999> it in the principal <WH7218>, and shall add <WH3254> the fifth part <WH2549> more <WH3254> thereto, and give <WH5414> it unto him to whom it appertaineth, in the day <WH3117> of his trespass offering <WH819>. in the day: or, in the day of his being found guilty: Heb. in the day of his trespass

And he shall bring <WH935> his trespass offering <WH817> unto the LORD <WH3068>, a ram <WH352> without blemish <WH8549> out of the flock <WH6629>, with thy estimation <WH6187>, for a trespass offering <WH817>, unto the priest <WH3548>:

And the priest <WH3548> shall make an atonement <WH3722> for him before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068>: and it shall be forgiven <WH5545> him for any thing <WH259> of all that he hath done <WH6213> in trespassing <WH819> therein.
And the LORD <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Command <WH6680> Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121>, saying <WH559>, This is the law <WH8451> of the burnt offering <WH5930>: It is the burnt offering <WH5930>, because of the burning <WH4169> upon the altar <WH4196> all night <WH3915> unto the morning <WH1242>, and the fire <WH784> of the altar <WH4196> shall be burning <WH3344> in it. because: or, for the burning

And the priest <WH3548> shall put <WH3847> on his linen <WH906> garment <WH4055>, and his linen <WH906> breeches <WH4370> shall he put <WH3847> upon his flesh <WH1320>, and take up <WH7311> the ashes <WH1880> which the fire <WH784> hath consumed <WH398> with the burnt offering <WH5930> on the altar <WH4196>, and he shall put <WH7760> them beside <WH681> the altar <WH4196>.

And he shall put off <WH6584> his garments <WH899>, and put on <WH3847> other <WH312> garments <WH899>, and carry forth <WH3318> the ashes <WH1880> without <WH2351> the camp <WH4264> unto a clean <WH2889> place <WH4725>.

And the fire <WH784> upon the altar <WH4196> shall be burning <WH3344> in it; it shall not be put out <WH3518>: and the priest <WH3548> shall burn <WH1197> wood <WH6086> on it every morning <WH1242>, and lay the burnt offering <WH5930> in order <WH6186> upon it; and he shall burn <WH6999> thereon the fat <WH2459> of the peace offerings <WH8002>.
The fire <WH784> shall ever <WH8548> be burning <WH3344> upon the altar <WH4196>; it shall never go out <WH3518>.
And this is the law <WH8451> of the meat offering <WH4503>: the sons <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> shall offer <WH7126> it before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068>, before <WH6440> the altar <WH4196>.

And he shall take <WH7311> of it his handful <WH7062>, of the flour <WH5560> of the meat offering <WH4503>, and of the oil <WH8081> thereof, and all the frankincense <WH3828> which is upon the meat offering <WH4503>, and shall burn <WH6999> it upon the altar <WH4196> for a sweet <WH5207> savour <WH7381>, even the memorial <WH234> of it, unto the LORD <WH3068>.

And the remainder <WH3498> thereof shall Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> eat <WH398>: with unleavened bread <WH4682> shall it be eaten <WH398> in the holy <WH6918> place <WH4725>; in the court <WH2691> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150> they shall eat <WH398> it.

It shall not be baken <WH644> with leaven <WH2557>. I have given <WH5414> it unto them for their portion <WH2506> of my offerings made by fire <WH801>; it is most <WH6944> holy <WH6944>, as is the sin offering <WH2403>, and as the trespass offering <WH817>.

All the males <WH2145> among the children <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> shall eat <WH398> of it. It shall be a statute <WH2706> for ever <WH5769> in your generations <WH1755> concerning the offerings <WH801> of the LORD <WH3068> made by fire <WH801>: every one that toucheth <WH5060> them shall be holy <WH6942>.
And the LORD <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

This is the offering <WH7133> of Aaron <WH175> and of his sons <WH1121>, which they shall offer <WH7126> unto the LORD <WH3068> in the day <WH3117> when he is anointed <WH4886>; the tenth part <WH6224> of an ephah <WH374> of fine flour <WH5560> for a meat offering <WH4503> perpetual <WH8548>, half <WH4276> of it in the morning <WH1242>, and half <WH4276> thereof at night <WH6153>.

In a pan <WH4227> it shall be made <WH6213> with oil <WH8081>; and when it is baken <WH7246>, thou shalt bring <WH935> it in: and the baken <WH8601> pieces <WH6595> of the meat offering <WH4503> shalt thou offer <WH7126> for a sweet <WH5207> savour <WH7381> unto the LORD <WH3068>.

And the priest <WH3548> of his sons <WH1121> that is anointed <WH4899> in his stead shall offer <WH6213> it: it is a statute <WH2706> for ever <WH5769> unto the LORD <WH3068>; it shall be wholly <WH3632> burnt <WH6999>.
For every meat offering <WH4503> for the priest <WH3548> shall be wholly burnt <WH3632>: it shall not be eaten <WH398>.
And the LORD <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> unto Aaron <WH175> and to his sons <WH1121>, saying <WH559>, This is the law <WH8451> of the sin offering <WH2403>: In the place <WH4725> where the burnt offering <WH5930> is killed <WH7819> shall the sin offering <WH2403> be killed <WH7819> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068>: it is most <WH6944> holy <WH6944>.

The priest <WH3548> that offereth it for sin <WH2398> shall eat <WH398> it: in the holy <WH6918> place <WH4725> shall it be eaten <WH398>, in the court <WH2691> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>.

Whatsoever shall touch <WH5060> the flesh <WH1320> thereof shall be holy <WH6942>: and when there is sprinkled <WH5137> of the blood <WH1818> thereof upon any garment <WH899>, thou shalt wash <WH3526> that whereon it was sprinkled <WH5137> in the holy <WH6918> place <WH4725>.

But the earthen <WH2789> vessel <WH3627> wherein it is sodden <WH1310> shall be broken <WH7665>: and if it be sodden <WH1310> in a brasen <WH5178> pot <WH3627>, it shall be both scoured <WH4838>, and rinsed <WH7857> in water <WH4325>.
All the males <WH2145> among the priests <WH3548> shall eat <WH398> thereof: it is most <WH6944> holy <WH6944>.

And no sin offering <WH2403>, whereof any of the blood <WH1818> is brought <WH935> into the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150> to reconcile <WH3722> withal in the holy <WH6944> place, shall be eaten <WH398>: it shall be burnt <WH8313> in the fire <WH784>.
